Class Date

  • Object
    • Date

  • public class Date
extends Object
    Author:
    SIMONE PAGLINO

    Date class represents a date and provides several methods on dates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int gg
      The numeric value of the day of the month.
      private int mm
      The numeric value of the month.
      private int yyyy
      The numeric value of the year.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Date

        public Date(int gg,
            int mm,
            int yyyy)
        Constructor to create a new instance of Date class.
        Parameters:
        gg - The numeric value of the day of the month.
        mm - The numeric value of the month.
        yyyy - The numeric value of the year.

    • Method Detail

      • getDay

        public int getDay()
        Returns:
        It returns the numeric value of the day of the month.

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Returns:
        It returns the numeric value of the month.

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Returns:
        It returns the numeric value of the year.

      • isFormatDate

        public static boolean isFormatDate(String timestamp)
        Parameters:
        timestamp - A timestamp having format (gg/mm/aaaa --- Example: 01012001 - 1° gennaio 2001).
        Returns:
        It returns true if the timestamp passed as argument is a validate date, otherwise false.

      • isDate

        public static boolean isDate(int d,
                             int m,
                             int y)
        Parameters:
        d - The numeric value of the day of the month.
        m - The numeric value of the month.
        y - The numeric value of the year.
        Returns:
        It returns true if the arguments passed represent a valid Date object, otherwise false.

      • getCurrentDate

        public static Date getCurrentDate()
        Returns:
        It returns a Date object representing the date of the current day.

      • isBisestile

        public static boolean isBisestile(int y)
        Parameters:
        y - The numeric value of the year.
        Returns:
        return a boolean to check if the year argument is a leap year.
        See Also:
        When a year is a leap year?

      • compareTo

        public static int compareTo(Date d1,
                            Date d2)
        The method compares the first Date object with the second one.
        Parameters:
        d1 - Date object passed as first argument.
        d2 - Date object passed as second argument.
        Returns:
        It returns 0 if the dates are equal, 1 if the first date is bigger than the other, and -1 in the opposite scenario.

      • getDateObj

        public static Date getDateObj(String date)
        Parameters:
        date - A timestamp of format (gg/mm/aaaa).
        Returns:
        It returns a Date object representing the timestamp 'date' passed as argument.
